data.eml:eml: The wolf spider species from Peru and Bolivia described by Embrik Strand in 1908 (Araneae: Lycosidae: Lycosinae, Sosippinae, Allocosinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brescovit, Antonio D., Álvares, Éder S. S. (2011): The wolf spider species from Peru and Bolivia described by Embrik Strand in 1908 (Araneae: Lycosidae: Lycosinae, Sosippinae, Allocosinae). Zootaxa 3037: 51-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204740
